intro: Microlicia rotundifolia, commonly known as the round-leaf microlicia, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil, and thrives in humid, shaded environments. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and greenhouses.
